properties.name: mybatis-mapper.setting.enable
properties.description: Whether to enable the mybatis-mapper plugin, enabled by default

properties.name: mybatis-mapper.setting.enable-logger
properties.description: Whether to enable global log printing

properties.name: mybatis-mapper.setting.enable-mapper-scan-log
properties.description: Whether to enable mapper scan log, this configuration depends on whether 'enableLogger' is enabled.

properties.name: mybatis-mapper.setting.enable-runtime-log
properties.description: Whether to enable printing SQL running log, this configuration depends on whether 'enableLogger' is enabled.

properties.name: mybatis-mapper.setting.enable-compilation-log
properties.description: Whether to enable printing SQL compilation log, this configuration depends on whether 'enableLogger' is enabled.

properties.name: mybatis-mapper.setting.enable-xml-syntax-parsing
properties.description: Whether to enable xml syntax parsing, enable to use XML template syntax parsing, disabled by default

properties.name: mybatis-mapper.setting.enable-keywords-to-uppercase
properties.description: Keyword case conversion, using lowercase keywords by default
